newsitem.title: USA: NuCo2 in bulk carbon dioxide supply pact.
newsitem.headline: NuCo2 in bulk carbon dioxide supply pact.

text.p: NuCo2 Inc said Tuesday it agreed to supply bulk carbon dioxide systems and liquid carbon dioxide to 530 convenience stores operated by Total Petroleum (North America) Ltd.

NuCo2 said it expects to begin installation at the majority of the locations immediately. Total Petroleum operates the stores in 12 states, with the greatest concentration in the Southwest and Midwest.

NuCo2's "recent acquisitions in the Oklahoma and Kansas markets which added new geography to the company's service area has enabled us to reach this agreement with Total Petroleum," chief executive Edward Sellian said in a statement.
